short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily gather and download all images from any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Monkey is a handy Chrome extension that allows you to display and download all images on a webpage in their original size. With this extension, you can efficiently browse and save images from websites.

Key Features:

Â· Display Images: Shows all images on the current webpage in an organized gallery.
Â· Single Image Download: Allows downloading individual images.
Â· Full Page Screenshots: Create full-page screenshots that are automatically scrolled and stitched into one image.
Â· Download All Images as ZIP: Download all images found on the page with a single click as a ZIP file.

Never miss valuable images again! With Image Monkey, you can quickly and easily browse any webpage and download the desired images in the highest quality.

Installation: Click "Add to Chrome" and follow the instructions to install Image Monkey in your browser.

Note: For proper functionality, the extension requires permissions to access webpage content.
